abstract: Attorneys for family of black woman Sandra Bland, who was found hanged in Texas jail cell after being arrested for traffic stop, request prosecutors to pursue criminal charges against state trooper Brian Encinia, who had detained her; move comes day after grand jurors decided not to indict her jailers.
lead_paragraph: Though grand jury decided not to indict any jailers in connection with Ms. Bland’s death, the panel could still consider criminal charges against the arresting trooper.

headline.main: Sandra Bland’s Family Calls for Criminal Charges Against Texas Trooper
headline.print_headline: Woman’s Survivors Urge Texas to Charge Trooper

snippet: Though grand jury decided not to indict any jailers in connection with Ms. Bland’s death, the panel could still consider criminal charges against the arresting trooper.
